summary: Unit test module that validates the Terraform Kubernetes AllowedCapabilitiesSysAdmin security check, confirming that the check correctly identifies disallowed sysadmin capabilities in pod specifications and that the Checkov runner processes the plan without errors.
business_intent: Enforce security compliance by preventing Kubernetes pods from being granted excessive Linux capabilities, specifically sysadmin rights, and ensure the automated scanning tool reliably detects such violations during infrastructure-as-code validation.
